section.p: You emerge from your cabin to find all hands on deck and the ship speeding ahead under a full press of sail. It is with some astonishment that you see another vessel far astern.
‘They’re pirates, skipper,’ says the mate. ‘Been on our tail since the end of the last watch, but I think we can outrun them.’
‘I should have been woken up at once!’ you tell him severely.

choices.choice: Continue to run from the pirates
Drop sail and turn to face them
